skills.name: SHIV
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to the target.
• 25% Chance to inflict Fear for 2 turns on each hit.
• Damage dealt increases the higher the target’s ATK and SPECIAL stats.

skills.name: CONTRABAND
desc: • Remove Counterstrike and Revenge effects from all enemies.
• 60% Chance to gain Counterstrike and Revenge for self for 2 turns.
• Grant Regen to all allies for 1 turn.
• Instantly grant an Extra Turn to self and a random ally.

skills.name: TENACITY
desc: Grants Immunity to Silence and Crave effects to all allies. Gain either Physical, Magic, or True Damage Invulnerability at the start of battle for the duration of battle.
